English: Hey, you there! Don't let 'em get away!
Chinese: 喂、在那裡的！　不要讓那些傢伙逃跑了！
Korean: 어이, 거기 너! 그 녀석들을 놓치지 마!
German: He, du da! Lass sie nicht entwischen!

English:
Heh heh... That's a good 'mon. I'll take reaaaal
good care of you, don't worry.
Chinese:
嘿嘿……好乖～你是乖孩子呢。
……我一～定會好好地疼愛你的喔。
German:
Hehe ... Was für brave Monster. Keine Bange,
ich werde mich gut um euch kümmern.

Chinese:
……就是那傢伙，
他就是志賀陽司。

English:
Good timing! Help me capture these guys here,
would you?
Chinese:
正好！
我要對他們使用「捕捉器」呢，一起來幫我。
German:
Perfektes Timing! Hilf mir, diese Kerlchen
hier zu schnappen, ja?

English:
Take a look, you don't see programs like this
around here. It's got to be a rare one. Do a good
job and I'll even let you have one.
Chinese:
快看，這是在這一帶沒看過的程式，一定很稀有。
如果順利的話，我讓一隻給你們。
Korean:
잘 봐. 이 근처에선 본 적 없는 프로그램이다.
틀림없이 레어한 놈들이야. 잘 풀리면 한 마리 줄테니까
German:
Schau mal, solche Programme sieht man hier nie.
Das müssen seltene sein. Streng dich an,
dann kriegst du eins ab.

English:
All right, now... What happens next is up to you.
This is your test.
Chinese:
他這麼說。
……隨你喜歡吧。這是你的「測驗」。
German:
Also. Was als Nächstes geschieht, liegt an dir.
Dies ist deine Prüfung.

English:
Poor things. Let 'em go.
...We can't let Shiga get suspicious of us.
Chinese:
好可憐喔，幫助他們逃跑好了
……不能被志賀給察覺到
Korean:
가엾다, 놔주자
…시가의 경계를 살 수는 없어
German:
Die Armen! Lass sie frei.
... Shiga darf keinen Verdacht schöpfen.

English: Hey! What're you letting them run off for?!
Chinese: 啊！！喂！幹麼讓他們逃走啊！
German: He! Warum lässt du sie weglaufen?!
Ich flehe dich an, hör auf ...

English: Ah, you dummy! Don't let them get away!
Chinese: 啊！　笨蛋！　不要讓他們逃了啊！
German: Ach, du Dummkopf! Lass sie nicht entkommen!

English:
Damn, and I'd finally chased them down...! Hey,
you guys! Get back here!
Chinese:
可惡、好不容易把他們逼到走投無路了……！
站住啊！混蛋！
Korean: 젠장, 간신히 몰아넣었는데…! 기다려 이 녀석들!
German:
Mist, endlich hatte ich sie ...! He, ihr da!
Kommt mal her!

English: Oy, you guys stay out of my way!
German: Ihr solltet mir nicht in die Quere kommen!

Chinese: 看你正忙還真是抱歉啊。

English: That being said...we do have business with you.
German: Allerdings haben wir was mit dir zu besprechen.

English:
...The handymen! You mean to tell me I've caught
Zaxon's attention?!
Chinese:
……是便利店！
該不會，是Zaxon在找我――！？
German:
... Die Handymen! Heißt das, Zaxon ist auf
mich aufmerksam geworden?!

English: You're a sharp one, aren't you?
German: Du bist ein schlaues Kerlchen, was?

English:
"Come to the real world, and repent your crimes
that threw EDEN into disarray." ...Just a little
message from "Yuugo."
Chinese:
來自「YUGO」的留言。
「擾亂EDEN秩序的罪，就在現實世界懺悔一陣子」
――他是這麼說的。
Korean:
"유고"로부터의 전언이다.
「EDEN의 질서를 어지럽힌 죄, 
 잠시 현세에서 뉘우치고 와라」――더군
German:
„Komm in die echte Welt und bereue deine Taten,
die in EDEN Chaos verursacht haben.“ ... Eine
kleine Nachricht von „Yuugo“.
